[[Image:Oldcastle Pin.png|right|thumb|200px|Map showing the location of [[Oldcastle]] on the continent of [[Westeros]].]]
'''Oldcastle''' is a castle in [[the North]], the region ruled by [[House Stark]] of [[Winterfell]]. Oldcastle is located on the northern coast of [[the Bite]], south-east of [[White Harbor]] and not far from the mouth of the [[White Knife]] river.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/moat_cailin/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Moat Cailin entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Oldcastle is the seat of House Locke.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===

Oldcastle is seen on a map of the North that [[Roose Bolton]] has in [[The Dreadfort|the Dreadfort]], when he is pointing at [[Moat Cailin]] to the west.<ref>"[[The Lion and the Rose]]"</ref>
